page.title: 03Sand dunes
page.content:
There are long stretches of sands with
low sand dunes.The dunes are covered with many kinds of grasses and wild plants.The tide takes the sea along way out into the estuary,and the soft sand is excavated. The dunes are always changing shape because of the strong winds.Where the grass and plants grow the sand does not move so easily.Fences have been built and the ground has been levelled and grassed to stop the sand moving.These are now used as picnic sites.Red Fescue grass,saltwort,sand twitch grass,lyme grass,Daisy,Buttercup,Wild Poppy,were found in the area of the sand dunes.
